title: Tutorials
meta_description: Oracle Application Express tutorials; Oracle Learning Library - Application Express tutorials; Oracle Application Express Learning Paths

sections.title: Oracle Application Express Tutorial
sections.description: Create a simple Human Resources (HR) application for the fictitious AnyCo Corp which manages departmental and employee information stored in database tables. This tutorial demonstrates how to build, modify, and run the application. Each chapter is a further lesson that advances the work of previous one so that the concepts build on one another.

sections.title: Learning Paths - Release 18
sections.description: These Learning Paths are a collection of brief tutorials that guide you on how to build and enhance database Web applications using Oracle Application Express.
